title: Welcome to My Hypercard App
text:
Welcome to this hypercard-style application! Click on any link in [[double brackets]] to navigate between cards.

Getting Started:
- [[Introduction]] - Learn about this application
- [[GettingStarted]] - How to use this system
- [[Features]] - Key features and capabilities
- [[Help]] - Get assistance

Content Categories:
- [[HTML_Files]] - Interactive visualizations
- [[JavaScript_Files]] - Supporting scripts
- [[CSS_Files]] - Style sheets
- [[Markdown_Files]] - Documentation

Main Navigation Cards:
  • [[Welcome]] - This card
  • [[Introduction]] - Application overview
  • [[GettingStarted]] - Usage guide
  • [[Features]] - Feature list
  • [[Examples]] - Usage examples
  • [[Navigation]] - How to navigate
  • [[Credits]] - Attribution
  • [[Help]] - Help guide
  • [[FAQ]] - Frequently asked questions
  • [[Resources]] - Additional resources
  • [[RepoIndex]] - Repository index

Open the Full Navigation Guide to see all HTML visualizations.
